jump_scares.spoiler: There is a loud bang (like a gunshot)
A bulldozer crashes through the house
C appears deep in thought for several seconds before M bangs on the window and startles him
A blue light appears in the fireplace out of nowhere and makes a loud sound
A glowing white figure appears in the camera, which startles Mike
There is a slight jump scare as we get a sudden flashback to Arlette’s decomposing corpse in the well
A rat scuttles out from underneath a box
A man opens the door revealing Eddie in his non-human state
The cop searching for the beast is suddenly grabbed
A man opens a closet door and a body falls out
The bat creature comes alive and bites Tomaz
Magda is grabbed from behind
Magda is stabbed through the hole
Veronica is suddenly attacked from the side by the senator while entering a shed
Veronica turns around, shining the torch’s light on the captain

movies.title: Antrum: The Deadliest Film Ever Made.

jump_scares.spoiler: One of the Heptapods places a tentacle on the barrier near where Louise is standing
During a dream where Louise is talking to Ian in her room, Louise looks up and Ian has been replaced by a Heptapod
The Heptapod places a tentacle on the barrier causing Louise and Ian to be pushed back by an unseen force
An ambulance crashes into a car in front of Malorie and Jess
After Malorie shoots her gun several times, the stranger suddenly grabs her and yells “take your damn blindfold off”
After repeating Malorie’s name several times, the girl is pulled to the ground and dragged away
A loud gunshot may startle very sensitive viewers
Bee gets scared by Greg climbing up the stairs
As Bee is looking around, David suddenly throws his body against the window behind her
After being woken up by Alice, Greg’s sudden move scares the group of girls
Sophie hugs Bee from behind
A dog starts barking at the fence as Clare and Andi walk by
Something bumps into the car and it violently shakes
The camera cuts from the driver to a man standing in the road
The doctor turns on the lights and Belial is revealed to be hiding on the wall
Belial jumps out of the basket as it’s opened
The basket is opened and Belial starts screaming
Belial starts screaming
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
The can rolls and reveals a girl in a gas mask
The girl is suddenly in front of him
The man is attacked by a vampire
Quinn abruptly jumps up and attacks the medical examiner in the hospital. [Video]
Herbert yells “Boo!
The cardboard boxes fall over
The woman suddenly screams while driving, followed by a cut to a deformed looking man on the car window
A vulture suddenly screeches and flies into the car through a side window
There is a wide shot of some ruins while Paul is driving down a road. Suddenly, a burnt hand appears on one of the bricks accompanied by a string sound effect
Paul reaches in for the water, and Djinn’s hand suddenly reaches out of it and grabs him
The phone rings which startles the family at the dinner table
Mrs. Graciella turns around and it is revealed to be Cady in disguise
Cady grabs Sam around the neck
Cady puts a gun to Sam’s head
Marc suddenly brakes the van after hearing a noise
Marc looks up to the car window and a man is on the other side watching him, which causes him to scream
The killer appears behind a closing trunk lid
Ranger Art spits blood at the car window
Danny gets stabbed through the back with a machete
Sue reaches down to put flowers on Carrie’s grave however a bloodied hand reaches out of the ground and grabs her. [Video]
Mary looks down from the railings to the first floor, and gasps as the camera cuts to the strange man staring directly at her from downstairs
After Father Simon says “Now,” the camera pans to the left to show Alan being pulled out of a bathtub by someone and screaming
Alan is suddenly shot in the head
A creature comes into view in the crack
A creature jumps at Friend as he turns around
The creature snarls to stop Gunner
A creature suddenly appears in the view hole
Kay’s head turns towards Andy to reveal her face is covered in congealed blood
There is a very slight jump scare as Andy shines his torch on a woman and a percussion sound effect plays
Leah opens a window and begins to scream, followed by a cut to a woman watching them from outside
As Cooper and Leah walk through a hallway, Dale suddenly breaks a window to the side with a hammer
A man gets sliced into chunks by one of the traps
Barnabas appears behind Roger as he searches for the secret room
Angelique suddenly projectile vomits towards Barnabas
A scary face flashes up on Casey’s laptop. [Video]
The oil slick jumps onto Rachel hand and eats her alive
Mrs. Lansing hits a hitchhiker with her Mercedes
The dead hitchhiker, jump into Mrs. Lansing’s window
White Arlene is lifting the blinds up, something flies into the window
A hand hits the car window after Noah calls out to uncle Morgan
Cujo jumps up at the car window
Cujo jumps onto the hood of the car
Cujo runs at the cop exploring the building
Cujo breaks through the window behind Donna
Something comes loose on the boat and almost hits John
Hughie lunges at Rae from behind a curtain. [Video]
A worm-like mouth flies at Layla’s eye while she is peeping through the hole
Hermann is hit on the head after the hole says “Remember, that was your dream.
In Doctor Thurman’s office, Donnie screams “I can see him right now” and, accompanied by a sound effect, the camera cuts to Frank who is standing in front of him
Ricky (one of the bullies) grabs Gretchen in Grandma Death’s cellar
There is a loud explosion on the plane
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
Something large suddenly falls down in front of the window and bangs on it
Will’s foot slips on the snow and he falls down
There is an explosion
A body falls and hits a truck
An elevator drops down close to the building’s repairman
Someone falls onto the top of the elevator causing a loud bang
The devil appears from behind the people who are still alive

movies.title: Errementari: The Blacksmith and the Devil

jump_scares.spoiler: A snake suddenly gets hit by a stone
The professor suddenly grabs Edna by the mouth with chloroform
While on the Thunder Mountain rollercoaster, a man’s head hits against a ceiling, becomes decapitated, and flies at the camera
A park guest’s face shifts into a creepy smile accompanied by a sound cue as she walks past the camera
There is a sudden explosion at the Spaceship Earth attraction and it collapses
Car hits the truck from the front
Car hits the truck from the front
Linda shouts before the car crash
During a quiet establishing shot of a stately room, a man suddenly falls through the roof
Danny suddenly falls through the ice
As Ben says “I have the antidote” he is suddenly tackled by Jason
As Zoe says “Ben, get up”, she is suddenly attacked by the Game-master
A dog bark startles Jenny as she sunbathes
As a joke Steve scares Jenny in the tent
A car horn blares during a suspenseful scene
The boy is suddenly standing behind the refrigerator
When Gail and Luke are playing the piano, the keyboard lid slams shut out of nowhere
Ruth suddenly appears behind Gail and Josh
Josh suddenly screams
A child runs out in front of Rain and is grabbed by someone in all black
The person on the phone suddenly cries out
An owl lands on the window sill of Alex’s bedroom
Todd’s dead body twitches
Terry is hit by a bus. [Video]
The teacher’s computer explodes as she leans over it

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan

jump_scares.spoiler: An apparition of a young Jason emerges from a mirror
Jason punches through a bathroom door and grabs one of the students
A crew member surprises Mr. McCulloch and a jump scare sound effect can be heard
Jason surprises Rennie and Sean by knocking over some boxes (and other stuff)
A hand unexpectedly appears on the bed
During a flashback young Jessie looks across the bed to see a scary looking bald man (the Moonlight Man) licking her feet
Jessie looks in the rear vision mirror and sees the deformed bald man
A wolf suddenly appears in front of Dan
Just as in the original Austrian version, the title card appears on screen alongside loud heavy metal music which will likely startle those with the sound turned up
Video footage shows Hannibal suddenly bite a woman
During a tense scene, Hannibal grabs Pazzi
Miles’ abductor suddenly kicks in his door when he looks through the peephole
Zander suddenly gets shot in the head talking to Miles
Some lights come on and an animal in a trap is seen
The old woman suddenly attacks from behind
As they touch the woman she reanimates as a demon and the music comes in very loudly
Jessica yells now as a demon
A hammer suddenly strikes out of the hole in the wall
Some viewers might be startled by a loud gunshot as Ann shoots a zombie
A zombie appears in front of Ann as she flees the house
A corpse on a gurney sits up
Box 27 is opened, revealing the body of the man who was recently murdered
The guillotine blade drops
Professor Jarod’s face peels away
The camera pans back and reveals Danny standing in the doorway

movies.title: I Am the Pretty Thing That Lives in the House

jump_scares.spoiler: The phone is yanked out of Lily’s hand
Lily turns around and sees Iris watching her from the doorway
Lily catches a glimpse of Polly in the reflection of the television screen
Lily gasps and the reflection of Polly can be seen in Lily’s eye
Some children appear in front of Josh and Paxton
A shrouded figure grabs Josh in the museum
After a few seconds of droning sounds as the camera zooms in on the saleswoman, there is a sudden clinking noise that causes her to flinch
There is an abrupt cut to JP breaking open a door
A knife pierces some wood
Anna suddenly appears behind Perry
The sight of various body parts in a freezer may startle some viewers
Becky calls out to Cal. She turns around and a woman suddenly emerges out of the grass (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
After hearing a noise, Travis crawls towards the tall grass to investigate. He then turns around and Tobin is right behind him
As Cal follows Becky, Ross suddenly puts his hand on Cal’s shoulder
Cal looks across and sees his own corpse lying beside him (this is accompanied by a sound effect)
Jang Kyung-chul breaks the window of the car
Jang Kyung-chul leaps from the left and tackles Jang Se-yun
After a tense scene the spaceship explodes mid sentence
A man appears in front of the car and gets hit
For the next one-and-a-half-minutes there is a fast montage of flashy, sometimes scary looking images
The body-double suddenly opens his eyes
There is a sudden cut to a man shooting a vase
Hooper looks into a hole in Ben Gardner’s boat when a human head appears from inside. [Video]
The shark jumps out while Brody is throwing bait into the water
The men begin pulling rope out of the water when the shark emerges
The shark slams into the shark proof cage
Jacob sees some birds flying above him at the party
Jacob sees a horn come out of Jezzie’s mouth as she dances
A sudden cut to a car braking and hitting a bike might startle some viewers
Jacob sees the reflection of his son in the mirror and reaches out to touch it however a demon head appears and he pulls back
Venna is grabbed from behind inside the corn field
While Fuller is looking through the back window, the truck driver breaks the window from the inside
Ani suddenly shoots Kate
A still shot of the ocean is suddenly interrupted by the shark jumping out of it
As Michael swims through the water, there is a cut to a moray eel swimming at his face/the camera
There is a cut to the shark quickly rising out of the water
A cult member runs at Jay
While Kyra reaches for the mirror cabinet there is a knock on the door, startling her
A sharp blade suddenly pierces through the wall
A deformed looking man jumps in front of the camera while it zooms in on a dark room
A hand breaks through the door and grabs Kyra
The young woman suddenly growls and bites down at the samurai’s neck
Evan looks between some clothes in his closet and Bel pops out
Genesis appears behind Evan while he is kneeling on the floor and hits him over the head
A burning moose jumped in the shot
The whisperer’s mouth abruptly opens, releasing blinding lights onto John
A clown jumps out of the pizza box
A bunch of tiny clown heads come out of the laundry hamper
Wade opens a door and is attacked by a zombie
Maggie has some flash-backs to when she was attacked by zombies
Maggie has further flash-backs while she is sleeping
Maggie appears in the doorway while Wade is sleeping
There is a sudden glass shattering sound that startles April
April is grabbed on the head by the green demon
A gas pump nozzle suddenly splatters a man’s face with gasoline (accompanied by a loud sound)
An electric knife turns on and cuts a woman’s arm (again, accompanied by a loud sound)
A lawnmower turns itself on
Seemingly dead man suddenly gets up with a scream
Fred opens the car trunk and the man inside jumps out and grabs him
Ma bangs on the window as the group are about to drive off
Some eggs are thrown at Ma’s car window
While in Ma’s bedroom, Haley and Maggie are startled by a girl holding a scary mask over her face
After entering the toilet, we see a figure in the mirror watching Dani. A few seconds later Dani runs out of the toilet and this is accompanied by some loud dissonant strings in the soundtrack

Josh is distracted by a person (who he believes to be Mark) entering the temple behind him. After he turns around and tells him “we’re not supposed to be here”, he is hit over the head by an unseen assailant
After witnessing Simon’s body being displayed ritualistically, Christian sits back up and a man blows some powder into Christian’s eyes

One of Susan’s employees shows her footage on her smart phone from a baby monitor. While looking at the phone, Susan suddenly sees a frightening image of Ray (the antagonist of the story she is reading) flash briefly on the screen
The store owner starts yelling “Whoa!” as an item is knocked over
There is a loud gunshot during a quiet scene
Skip opens the car door, breaking Amy out of her daze
As Morgan walks towards Amy, Lee suddenly appears in view behind Morgan
The lid of a barrel is removed to reveal a decomposed corpse
Paul wakes up and Annie is standing directly over his bed
Annie shoots Buster through the back with a shotgun
Annie jumps on Paul as he crawls away
After Marika begins to groan and enters some sort of trance, several birds slam into the window
After seeing some camera footage, Hori suddenly becomes very agitated
Some birds fly out at Kobayashi as he opens a sliding door
A sudden cut from a quiet scene where Kana is sleeping to an earlier scene where Hori is screaming may startle some viewers
Metal horse gets spit out by Jean Jacket onto Oj’s car
Something falls from the ceiling accompanied by a loud thud
A creature suddenly appears behind the glass
Andy quickly pans the camera to reveal one of the cultists standing next to him

During a nightmare, Sy is standing in an empty SavMart store with his eyes shut. He opens his eyes to reveal they are filled with blood. Suddenly he yells out and covers his face as blood gushes out of his eyes
A sudden sound of smashing dishes
As Maddox is in the water, a floating dead body bumps into her
Philip pushes the puppet off the bed. (Not really a jump scare but somewhat sudden and accompanied by a loud sound.)
The puppet rushes towards Philip
As Philip approaches a door, the puppet steps in front of a window on it and stares at him
A masked assailant suddenly runs at Philip from a dark corner of the room
A lady puts her hand on the window of Grant’s car
A loud thump comes from somewhere in the house
A ghost appears beside Maureen (it gradually fades in which lessens its impact somewhat)
A glass falls to the floor and breaks from behind Maureen
Several loud thumps over the next minute or so may startle some viewers
A bottle tips over and falls on its own
An alarm goes off during a tense and quiet scene
A snowball hits the window
A blast of air comes from the fireplace
The hand of the corpse moves
A loud noise plays
While running on the road, Peter is suddenly shot in the leg
A man with a knife suddenly lunges at Nick
A bat screeches and flies away
Colqhoun drops down in front of Reich
Reich suddenly grabs Boyd around the neck
Colqhoun falls through some wood and lands in front of Boyd
As Arbogast reaches the top of the stairs, a figure comes out of the bedroom and stabs him
Lila turns around the figure sitting on the chair and it is revealed to be the corpse of Norman’s mother, a few seconds later Norman rushes in wearing his mother’s clothes and a wig
Alexia turns on the torch and shines it on her face in an attempt to scare Justine
Paint is thrown over Justine
Justine removes the bed covers to reveal Adrien’s partially eaten leg (this is accompanied by some sudden loud music)
The cat jumps up at Dan’s face
The body suddenly jolts upwards and begins yelling
Megan’s father abruptly hits his head on the window behind Megan
A hand breaks through the door while Dan and Megan are talking
The priest starts screaming as his hands burn on the altar
Rawhead bursts through the crates
Rawhead grabs the woman through the door
William is grabbed from behind by an individual weafring a pig mask
Pamela is abducted as she walks down a hallway
A Jigsaw puppet suddenly lunges towards William
The mailman is stabbed with a needle
The little girl leans forwards to reveal Sadako standing right behind her
Sadako’s hand suddenly reaches out of the rocks and grabs Mayu’s arm
Sadako pulls the curtain open and there is a cut to a close-up of her face
There is suddenly a loud flash of several spooky images accompanied by a loud sound effect
Oz has a vision where he sees a clone of himself slowly approaching him. Suddenly, there is a cut to the clone’s face as he begins to scream
There is a sudden flash of Oz’s clone screaming
There is a quick flash of static after doctor closes his eyes
The main character, Mara, leans down from her desk and a few seconds later an explosion happens right off screen, splattering the room with blood
While driving, one of the drug dealers suddenly explodes
The student at the front of the classroom suddenly explodes
A vampire jumps into frame roaring as the camera pans down from the corner of the room. [Video]
An elevator suddenly starts, propelling Norman and Beth upwards
Beth turns around and sees a mummified corpse
Holographic images of space appear in front of Beth after she taps on the computer screen
A sea snake attacks Norman
Louise attempts to bite Evan
The camera cuts back from the casket to Petrie standing behind Billy, who startles him
Hippy spies on the SEALs attaching the warhead to one of the remote operated vehicles. He tries to go back to warn the others but Coffey is standing right behind him
Lindsey attempts to radio for help and gets as far as “Deep Core this is Cab One we need assist…..” before sparks come out of the electronics and the power goes out
One of the ghost kids suddenly appears (loud noise, during a pan to the right
One of the ghost kids is floating in the air (cut, loud noise
When the kid is cycling, suddenly the ghost kids appear (cut, loud noise
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
A sudden blur in front of the screen attacks the girl
The dead girl suddenly appears behind Martin
The dead girl is suddenly in the doorway
McKenzie suddenly appears on screen
A dog barks, startling Ted
The nurse screams when she sees the blob, and loud music begins to play
Steve gets startled by Jane when he walks around the corner
After Steve goes off screen, there’s a loud sound of cans falling down
Aaron turns around after entering the cabin and sees several of the group members
During a dream, the witches burst into Sarah’s room and attack her
The bathroom stall slams open to reveal the witches standing outside
Nancy quickly opens a shower door, startling Sarah
Nancy suddenly and aggressively attacks Sarah
Evan suddenly appears in the kitchen holding a knife
A bright camera flash may startle some viewers
Evan’s dad is suddenly on top of Evan strangling him
Lenny forcefully pushes Evan up against a wall
A sudden violin screeching noise startles Sang-won
The shaman from the beginning rushes out of the closet with two knives
A demon appears in front of the camera
A demon form of Echo lunges towards the screen
The swinging Echo turns into Curt
Doctor Feinstone grabs Robbie from behind after he opens a door
Doctor Feinstone breaks the glass and grabs Jamie
The hands on the door start pulling violently
A bloody body hits the roof
The coffin lid loudly slides off
After the screen fades out from a quiet scene, there is a sudden cut to Will loudly getting stabbed
After Abigail asks “Scott?” he suddenly bolts upright and begins to scream
The audio makes a loud distorted noise during a quiet scene
Brundlefly bursts through the glass window of the hopsital room where Veronica is about to have an abortion
Brundlefly jumps down from the ceiling onto Borans
The wind blows the window shut
Miss Giddens sees a face appear at the window
A thunder clap wakes Miss Giddens
There is a scream and the camera suddenly zooms in on a statue
The banging on the wall resumes, much louder and faster than before. It continues on and off over the next few minutes
A door slams shut
Grace’s face suddenly appears from a trapdoor in the rafters causing Eleanor to scream. [Video]
The camera slowly zooms in on a silhouette on the window, and then quickly cuts to the dead guest’s disfigured face
Masao opens the fridge door and there is a cut to a dead body inside
There is a sudden flashback to screaming faces
The front door suddenly opens during a quiet scene and a bunch of leaves fly inside
As Gloria approaches the car, she is attacked from behind
Behind Thomas there is suddenly a man in a mask
From the dark corner of the room a screaming man suddenly shoots out
When Thomas turns around, two people in cape stand behind him
A woman is suddenly shot in the head after saying “that almost hit me”
There is a loud explosion after a man steps on a mine
A pig suddenly drops onto the ramp startling the group
Martin is suddenly shot in the head with bloody results
A man’s hand suddenly appears inside Megan’s car holding a cigarette lighter. [Video]
Samantha is startled by the doorbell as she climbs the stairs
A loud thump can be heard on the other side of the attic door
A grimacing bloody face briefly appears on the screen several times
Accompanied by a loud orchestral chord, Winslow turns around to see Wake towering over him
Water breaks through the window accompanied by a discordant orchestral note
Winslow suddenly punches the clock
Wake suddenly runs at Winslow with an axe (this is accompanied by a loud orchestral beat)
The scene abruptly cuts from Jim typing to a very loud gunshot
Something appears behind Heidi
Camera cuts to an old lady
A strange baby-like creature with extra extremities starts screeching
As Leilani and Jibran argue in the car, a cyclist suddenly slams into the windshield
After the two get back into the car, a man suddenly strikes the window pane and frightens Jibran
The sudden appearance of a moth-like figure on the road causes Mary to swerve and crash the car
Mary gasps and appears shocked to see her husband sitting beside her bed
John turns over in bed and has a vision of his wife lying in the bed beside him
John smashes his head into the mirror. [Video]
As Jesse approaches the motel door there is a loud bang
Sarah suddenly appears in the hallway and attacks Jesse
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
Accompanied by a sound effect a bloodied man runs into view
John turns around and comes face to face with Cooper
Maya closes a cupboard revealing Jurgis behind her in the mirror
The man behind the camera hits the little girl with it
Ed hits the driving man with something
The lights turn on to reveal Ed’s reflection in the window, startling Tim
There is a loud cut to a dead body
As Lizzie sits on a bed nursing her amputated arm, we get 3 short sharp flash backs to Lizzie screaming which may startle some sensitive viewers

movies.title: The Perfume of the Lady in Black

jump_scares.spoiler: There is a sudden loud noise of a vase dropping
As Sylvia is cutting a face out of a photograph, there is a sudden cut to a cat shrieking at her
While the kittens are eating, one of them moves back, and accompanied by a string sound cue, a human finger becomes visible in the meat
The camera quickly pans to the right to reveal a man watching Sylvia through the window
The gator swims past the screen
Lucky barks as Day reaches towards the gator’s mouth
Jerry opens the freezer to find Pam. She jumps upwards and leatherface runs into the room
Leatherface jumps out at Franklin when him and Sally are walking through the trees
There are several quick cuts to the twins lying in the hallway covered in blood
Jack jumps out and attacks Hallorann with an axe
The camera quickly pans to show a bloodied man standing in the hallway behind Wendy
The pilot is shot
Jake jumps down in front of the camera
Mike suddenly grabs Lisa from behind
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
The witch grabs Caleb around the head, revealing a gnarled claw-like hand
The witch turns around and lets out a cackle
The goat attacks William
As Thomasin reaches down to touch William, Katherine suddenly pulls her away
A figure in red passes by the base of a ladder
Lucius suddenly grabs Ivy’s outstretched hand as a creature approaches
Ivy falls into a hole
The creature with the red cloak suddenly runs at Ivy
Fiona looks up and screams suddenly
During a flashback, a sock puppet briefly appears on screen accompanied by an electronic noise that may startle some viewers
Lisa backs into Jerry
There is a loud noise from the roof of the house
A brief flash of a man’s bloodied mouth closing in on the camera may startle some viewers
There is a loud thud as a bird flies into a wall
There is a very short flashback to the Japanese man coming towards the screen
Sergeant Howie opens a closet door and a girl falls out
Sergeant Howie opens a coffin and a man lies in it with coins in his eyes
Howie wakes up and sees a severed hand beside him being used as a candle holder
A person, wearing a hare costume, appears to get her head cut during one of the rituals
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
There is a loud bang from a man’s truck as he reaches for his phone
A man bangs on the train window
A zombie appears at the window of a parked train
One of the burnt zombies lying on the ground twitches
As Hector looks down the naked woman’s body, an unseen assailant suddenly stabs Héctor in the arm
The man with the bandaged head suddenly looks through the window at Héctor
A table is thrown at Héctor as he climbs the stairs
Sawyer bangs on the door and it is suddenly opened by an orderly (there is a muted sound effect as the door opens but the scene is not startling enough to qualify as a true jump scare)

After Sawyer escapes the building she hides behind a tank but the camera pans around to reveal David who attacks her from behind (there is no sound effect and the scene is heavily telegraphed which lessens the impact)
As Max pulls the trigger in the tape, the TV suddenly explodes and innards begin to fly out of it
Nick appears behind Alex after she hears the Djinn whispering
A zombie version of Nick is sitting beside Alex
Someone shoves a jar of eyeballs into the camera as it proceeds down the hallway
Someone in a mask jumps right in Alex’s face with no warning
A hand reaches under the door
A hand bursts through the glass
There is a sudden musical burst as Charlie sees someone in the car
The coffin lid blows open
Betty sees Charlie in the car mirror
Roat leaps up from the floor and grabs Susy’s ankle. [Video]
A demon hand grabs her and startles her awake
A quick cut to the Djinn in full makeup
The Djinn appears at the shower curtain
Dr. Barden is suddenly shot in the head
After a momentary silence, there is a loud bang as the dynamite explodes
Lucas begins talking to Iris but is suddenly shot mid-conversation
